summary: The perfect starter home for everyone, situated comfortably in Riverwood!
descriptionHtml:
\\AMAZING RIVERWOOD STARTER //

Thankyou to everyone who has downloaded and rated my mods! All of your encouragement and support means alot to me! However, I am no longer modding skyrim and have no future plans to support any of my mods.

*New House Mod In Is Up!! Take A Look!**
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10901

\\DESCRIPTION//
Adds a player house to Riverwood with everything you will need, Includes:
- A Forge
- A Workbench
- A Grindstone
- A Chopping Block
- An Alchemy Table
- An Enchanting Table
- A Mannequin
- Weapon Plaque x 4
- A Smelter
- A Underground Garden

Aswell as a bed and chest for safe storage!

\\INSTALLATION//
To Install Just Drag And Drop Into You DATA Folder, Make Sure 'Amazing Riverwood Starter Home' Is Checked Under 'Data Files" and Enjoy!!

\\VERSION HISTORY//

- V 1.0 Initial Release
- V 1.0.1 Added Navmesh
- V 1.1 Added Smelter And Garden

\\PLEASE READ//
If You Suffer From Frame Rate Issues Please Let Me Know And I Will Create An Optional File Which Places The House, The Basement And The Garden In Seperate Cells To Help With The Problem.


\\BUGS/CONFLICTS//
- None so far!
- Should Not Conflict With Anything Aslong As Nothing Has Been Place Where The House Has!

MATTCM919
author: Mattcm919
